api_list.description: Calculate the area of a triangle.

api_list.description: Calculate the circumference of a circle.

required_parameters.description: The annual interest rate (as a decimal).

required_parameters.description: The number of times the interest is compounded per year.

required_parameters.description: The number of years the money is invested or borrowed for.

api_list.description: Convert temperature from Celsius to Fahrenheit.

api_list.description: Convert temperature from Fahrenheit to Celsius.

api_list.name: cosine
api_list.description: Calculate the cosine of an angle in radians.

api_list.name: degrees_to_radians
api_list.description: Convert degrees to radians.

api_list.name: digital_root
api_list.description:
Calculate the digital root of a number, which is the iterative process of summing the digits of a number,
    until a single-digit number is reached.

required_parameters.name: number
required_parameters.description: The number to find the digital root of.

api_list.name: divide
api_list.description: Divide two numbers.

api_list.name: euler_number_approximation
api_list.description: Approximate Euler's number using a series expansion.

required_parameters.name: iterations
required_parameters.description: The number of terms to include in the approximation.

api_list.name: euler_totient_function
api_list.description: Calculate Euler's Totient Function for a given n, which is the count of numbers less than n that are relatively prime to n.

api_list.name: factorial
api_list.description: Calculate the factorial of a number.

required_parameters.name: number
required_parameters.description: The number to find the factorial of.

api_list.name: factorial_recursive
api_list.description: Calculate the factorial of a number using recursion.

api_list.name: fibonacci_recursive
api_list.description: Calculate the nth Fibonacci number using recursion.

required_parameters.name: n
required_parameters.description: The position in the Fibonacci sequence.

api_list.name: fibonacci_sequence
api_list.description: Generate a list of Fibonacci numbers up to the nth number.

required_parameters.name: n
required_parameters.description: The length of the Fibonacci sequence to generate.

api_list.name: gcd
api_list.description: Compute the greatest common divisor of a and b.

api_list.name: gcd_extended
api_list.description: Extended Euclidean Algorithm. It returns the coefficients of Bezout's identity and the greatest common divisor.

api_list.name: geometric_mean
api_list.description: Calculate the geometric mean of a list of numbers.

api_list.name: greatest_difference
api_list.description: Find the greatest difference between any two numbers in a list.

api_list.description: Calculate the harmonic mean of a list of numbers.

required_parameters.description: The other side of the triangle.

api_list.description: Calculate the interquartile range of a list of numbers.
